channel.title: Best AGP graphics card?
channel.description:
Well i'm not ready to buy a new motherboard with pci-e graphic card slot. And right now i'm running a geforce 5500, so i want to upgrade to the best AGP graphics card.
What is the best, nvidia, AGP graphics card?
edit - not really much point in this thread now, i just ordered a: "Novatech GeForce 7600GS 512MB DDR2 8x AGP, DVI, VGA,"

item.title: Best AGP graphics card?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“io9, post:5, topic:193673”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=257812.msg2142754#msg2142754 date=1206762492]
Maybe we can find an empty server for people from mitb to join =D.
[/quote]
Or make our own![/quote]
Where would we host it? I wouldn’t be able to do it on my pc, its slow as fuck. =D

btw come on msn :S your not on my much anymore.

Read full topic

item.title: Best AGP graphics card?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:3, topic:193673”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=257812.msg2142584#msg2142584 date=1206759467]

y would u order agp, agp sux ballsssssss

myb bcuz i cba to get a new motherboard, which most probably would entail getting a whole host of other stuff including, but not limitied to:
A new case
A new cpu
New ram.

It all adds up and all I wish to do is play battlefield 2 without lagging. Seeing as battlefield 2 doesn’t even support my current geforce 5500 I may as well upgrade for £50 to one of the best AGP cards.
[/quote]
BF2 supports my integrated nVidia 6100, and quite nicely at that. We should play some time.[/quote]
io9 plays a lot too, i am still to play with him. Maybe we can find an empty server for people from mitb to join =D.

Read full topic

It all adds up and all I wish to do is play battlefield 2 without lagging. Seeing as battlefield 2 doesn’t even support my current geforce 5500 I may as well upgrade for £50 to one of the best AGP cards.[/quote]
BF2 supports my integrated nVidia 6100, and quite nicely at that. We should play some time.
